name: Garfelf's Guide: Lost in the Cross-Platforming
name_original: Garfelf's Guide: Lost in the Cross-Platforming
description:
This is the port of the Garfelf's Guide 3 on Mac, Linux and for some reason Windows.

Wot do u need 2 do?

This game takes place after the events of the secret ending to Garfelf's Guide And The Secrets (Cross-Platforming) Within. Jordan travels back in time to the very day the event happened in the forest and now he needs to undo all of the events that lead to the dystopian future that is Garfelf's Guide And The Secrets (Cross-Platforming) Within. You'll half to collect the sticks laid out in the forest to refuel the camp fire or else Johnny Old Boy is going to lose it and try to kill you.

Spoilers! He Does.

Controls

Copy-pasted from the reuploaded BBFT itch.io page.

Use the WASD keys to move, and the mouse to turn. Left click to pick up firewood and fuel the fire. Hold down shift to run (Keep an eye on your stamina bar!), and press space bar to quickly look behind you. Escape can be used to pause, and can be held for about a second to quit at any time.

Credits

  • Micah McGonigal (a.k.a. mystman12) - made the original game
  • 1st Baldi - made the decompile, that I used to build the mod lol
  • YOU - played my crap
